```{r, include = FALSE }


#This Rmd draws in the model coef data and generates the table for use in the results and discussion section as RMardown 'mother-child' doc relationship.
```


```{r echo = FALSE}
# bring in the saved data to be tabled:
CoefRRFeed <- read.csv(file = here::here("03_code/01_code-output","CoefRRFeed.csv"))
CoefRROS <- read.csv(file = here::here("03_code/01_code-output","CoefRROS.csv"))
CoefRRUS <- read.csv(file = here::here("03_code/01_code-output","CoefRRUS.csv"))
CoefGGSFeed <- read.csv(file = here::here("03_code/01_code-output","CoefGGSFeed.csv"))
CoefGGSOS <- read.csv(file = here::here("03_code/01_code-output","CoefGGSOS.csv"))
CoefGGSUS <- read.csv(file = here::here("03_code/01_code-output","CoefGGSUS.csv"))
```


```{r echo = FALSE, results='asis'}
CoefRR <- rbind(CoefRRFeed, CoefRROS, CoefRRUS)
CoefGGS <- rbind(CoefRRFeed, CoefGGSOS, CoefGGSUS)


(tblCoefRR <- knitr::kable(CoefRR,
                        "latex",
                        escape = F,booktabs = T, 
                        digits = c(0,0,3)) %>% 
  column_spec(1, width = "3cm") %>% 
  column_spec(2:3, width = "1.5cm") %>% 
  kable_styling(c("striped", "bordered")))
  #this column_spec is supposed to set column widths to force text to wrap inside the colmn #https://community.rstudio.com/t/wrap-column-name-in-pdf-table-from-knitr-kable/3278/4)
                        #caption="RR Model(formula)") # %>%
#  kable_styling(c("striped", "bordered"), 
                #full_width = F) %>% 
#https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/kableExtra/versions/1.1.0/topics/column_spec
```


```{r echo = FALSE, results='asis'}
(tblCoefGGS <- knitr::kable(CoefGGS,
                  "latex",
                  escape = F, booktabs = T, 
                  digits = c(0,0,3)) %>% 
  column_spec(1, width = "3cm") %>% 
  column_spec(2:3, width = "1.5cm") %>% 
  kable_styling(c("striped", "bordered")) )
```
